ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] HI and Befallen question...
ygData.msgSnippet: Befallen is a good zone for a toon of your level, stay close to the zone when fighting and you should be alright. as you raise in level work your way in and
ygData.messageBody:
Befallen is a good zone for a toon of your level, stay
close to the zone when fighting and you should be
alright. as you raise in level work your way in and
bring havoc to the creatures that lurk in the compound
stay away from the well of the Damned because the fall
would either kill you or make you vunerable to the
25th level shadowknights on the 2nd level, above all
try to group for better protection. I'm a firm
believer that you should know all you can about a zone
before comitting yourself to venturing in it. Buy the
Everquest Atlas (The Maps of Myrist) and you will have
a good map of both levels.

Luis


--- fire_n_butterfly <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> Hi to all. Cahlia here, 19th season wood elf druid,
> who is trying
> desperately to level to 20 and claim my surname
> heheh! Oy I hate
> taking 1 step forward and 2 steps back!!
>
> Anyhow, I was looking up a quest yesterday and found
> one I am
> interested in. Starts in Felwithe talking to the
> high elf who stands
> by the water and tells you he is troubled by his
> son's disappearance,
> please talk to someone else. I found that if you go
> to Befallen and
> kill a skeletal foreman, it will spawn Sir
> (something or other starts
> with an A). I got the directions, etc. He gives you
> a token you take
> back and give to the high elf and he gives you his
> daughter's token.
> A pretty cool amulet with 3AC, +3wis, +3int, +3 cha,
> +3Sta, and +3
> agi I do believe. Anyhow....here's my question...can
> I make it in
> Befallen at level 20 ok? I'm scared from what I read
> to attempt it.
> Apparently everything aggros terribly. EQAtlas says
> level 7-25+ mobs,
> but since they are all necros and thermagists, the
> damages are much
> worse than they con. I HATE dying, and I'm too
> chicken to attempt
> without some feedback. Any suggestions or stories?
>
> Thanks!
> Cahlia
> 19th Season,Wood Elf Druid of Tunare
> Morrel Thule Server
> <Fates of Destiny>
>
>
>
